backend/main.mo: Motoko actor handling contact form submissions and user profiles with access control and admin/user permission checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing branding, logo, and SEO asset verification requirements with associated components and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-like mapping of frontend file paths to short functional descriptions for documentation or planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base styles defining OKLCH-themed color variables for light and dark modes along with global resets.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point including SEO metadata and links to generated favicon and Open Graph images.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with root layout and routes for Home, About, Solutions, and Contact pages.
frontend/src/components/contact/ContactF: React contact form with validation, topic selection, and backend submission via a mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Footer displaying branded logo, company info, quick links, and attribution using centralized branding config.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Responsive header with branded logo, desktop and mobile navigation, and active route highlighting.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Application layout component providing header, routed content via Outlet, and footer.
frontend/src/components/motion/RevealOnS: Animates child content into view on scroll using IntersectionObserver, with reduced‑motion support.
frontend/src/components/services/Service: Displays a clickable service card with icon, title, description, and keyboard accessibility.
Shows a modal with detailed service info, features, applications, and a contact CTA.
Provides search and category filters for services via input and select UI controls.
frontend/src/config/branding.ts: Central config exporting logo paths, favicon assets, and company branding metadata.
frontend/src/content/services.ts: Defines the Service type and a list of service entries with descriptions, features, and categories.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context for Internet Identity login, state management, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Exposes a mutation for submitting contact forms and invalidates related queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useReducedMotion.ts: Hook that tracks the prefers-reduced-motion media query and returns its current state.
frontend/src/hooks/useSeo.ts: Updates document title and SEO meta tags whenever title or description changes.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, custom light/dark OKLCH color variables, global styles, focus states, and utility classes for an industrial-themed design.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with SEO metadata, company overview, capabilities list, and animated reveal sections.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Implements the Contact page with SEO metadata, contact information blocks, and a contact form with scroll-based animations.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Builds the homepage featuring a hero section, services overview, CTAs, and animated service cards using SEO and UI components.
frontend/src/pages/SolutionsPage.tsx: Displays a filterable list of automation services with search, category filtering, and a detail panel driven by local state.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage support and hash-routing compatibility.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom color variables, extended theme settings, animations, and plugin integration for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing a full‑stack IC app scaffold, its features, image requirements, generated assets, known issues, and architectural notes for build/deploy planning.
